title: Cash in via International Banks and Partners
content:
#### ADVISORY:

Bank Transfer to Maya will be right back! Our partner is working to restore the service as soon as possible.

[How do I link my US bank account to GCash?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31650526006169-How-do-I-link-my-US-bank-account-to-GCash)

[What are the official US bank channels for Cash in?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/31650294812185-What-are-the-official-US-bank-channels-for-Cash-in)

[How do I cash in to GCash with a EU/UK or US Bank account?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/360025275074-How-do-I-cash-in-to-GCash-with-a-EU-UK-or-US-Bank-account)

[What are the official EU/UK bank channels for Cash in?](https://help.gcash.com/hc/en-us/articles/38713174904985-What-are-the-official-EU-UK-bank-channels-for-Cash-in)
